choices: She goes and looks for one of her friends, hoping for some information
1.content:
One day in the Digital World, Biyomon, a bird digimon with pink feathers, yellow feet, and blue eyes, was flying through the sky. As she flew she looked out over the Digital World’s horizons.

Boy, she thought things sure have been looking up since Owikawa restored the Digital World to the way it was before Malomyotismon’s takeover. She smiled at the thought. As she continued to fly, Biyomon’s pink, feather-covered belly began to growl. She looked down at it and blushed lightly.

“Boy, it sure doesn’t take long for a womon to get hungry nowadays.” She chirped. She angled towards the ground and flared as she brought her taloned feet to rest on the ground. Resting a feather-covered hand on her still-growling stomach, she began looking around searching for some bushes or trees that would hopefully have something to eat on them. She didn’t see any so she began walking, hoping to run into Agumon or one of her other friends who would know where to get something to eat. She ran into something, but it wasn’t one of her friends.

She had been so busy looking around she didn’t see the tree that was in front of her until she smacked into it. She stumbled back, her feathered hands massaging her beak. “That was stupid of me.” she said, giggling at her clumsiness. She then looked up to see what kind of tree she had run into.

It had a thick base and several long limbs that reached almost to the ground. And hanging from those branches was a strange fruit she had never seen before. It was round and pinkish colored. She walked up to one branch and plucked one of the pieces of fruit off. Holding the fruit in her hands, she poked it and squeezed it. It was smooth and had a tight feeling, and it squeaked like a mouse when she squeezed it. It almost felt like a small balloon.
1.title: The strange tree

choices: Go with chance and take the next fruit
Leave the fruit alone and stay away from the tree
Someone else comes to notice biyomon
11.content:
When biyomon took a bit of time over it, she contemplated the idea, and immediately just took a bite into the fruit itself. The flavor itself was feeling quite estatic with her taste buds, and her mental consideration of thought went haywire with passion over the loving fruit. Her body went into manifested symptoms of it as her heart raced in pumping, and her lungs filled with gasping and panting over it. Her eyes skimmed the fruit again as she took another bite, feeling the same bodily response, and cooing out in a form of rolling manifested passion.

"mmmm... this fruit tastes so YUMMY!" she Giggled out, her beak munching the fruit on up, and giving every bite a savoring chew as she did. The tasty meal was just so filling to her, as her body started to tingle at the belly and bulge out from that one puffy fruit she just ate. After licking her fingers clean she took a look over at her middle, and how swollen it was came into quite a fill of a wide eyed stare and a pumping at her heart from the sight of it. Her hands gave gentle shaking as she rubs her feathery appendage over the growth of her belly. "Man...did I eat that much?"

Her head and eyes shifted over to the direction of when a thump and tumble came into audible reach, and the sight of another fruit came up in her vision beside the tree. She didn't know if she should keep eating the fruit, but her belly gave off a slow and growly moan that sent her pattern of thoughts into the consideration of having another, and maybe even two more. What she can't do is really decide upon what she wants, and what she doesn't want right now. So what is she to do?
11.title: She takes a bite

choices: She shrugs it off and goes off to share with her friends.
She's become addicted to growing larger. (Quickly eats/bloats).
She's become addicted to the fruit itself. (Slowly eats/bloats).
111.content:
"Heee...one more won't hurt." She says aloud as she picks up the next fruit and starts eating it up, continuing to go at it slowly in order to enjoy each bite. By now Biyomon is fully aware that each bite makes her a little puffier, but she just doesn't seem to mind. Biyomon giggles a little as eventually finishes off the last bit of the fruit.

She looks her body over a bit to find that she's almost to the point where only her head, feet, and wings would be sticking out. Oddly enough, her wings are still not puffy, which gives Biyomon the appearance of an overstuffed bird. "Oh my, I've made quite a turkey of myself..." she thinks as she giggles to herself.

Biyomon begins to wonder if she should share the fruits with her friends, but then a funny feeling comes over her...namely, she feels like she wants to stick around and keep eating the fruits. "Well, I said one more wouldn't hurt...so maybe a few more won't hurt either..."
111.title: Bloaty Birdy

1112.content: She quickly eats and inflates bigger with every fruit she eats. "I wanted to be the biggest digimon in the digital world and the fruit are helping me do it!" She said with glee as she stuffed herself with more fruit!
1112.title: She's become addicted to growing larger.

choices: "Nope, going to give it to one of my friends!"
11123.content: 8 hours later, she is now big enough to cover most of the sky. Her boobs her now massive and she rubbed them with bliss. "This is more like it." she said, "But, one more couldn't hurt." She thought about it and said...
11123.title: 8 hours later...

choices: Gatomon and Biyomon fight over the fruit.
Gatomon and Biyomon force-feed each other.
They feel compelled to get others to eat the fruit.
They feel compelled to bring a particular someone to the tree.
They feel they should leave the tree alone.
13.content:
Just before Biyomon could contemplate what to do with the fruit, she heard footsteps approach her. She turns to find her friend Gatomon, a white-furred cat-like digimon. "So you stopped here for a snack too?" asks Gatomon, as she eyes the fruit in Gatomon's hands.

Biyomon shakes her head. "Not exactly, but I was hungry..." she says. She takes one of her talon-like fingers and tries to cut the fruit with it. Expecting it to burst, she instead finds that it cuts open like a piece of foam rubber. "Oh, good, I guess we can share it after all." says Biyomon, as she hands Gatomon half of the fruit. Gatomon takes it gratefully, and the two of them start to eat.

"Mmmm...this is so tasty...but I can't quite place a flavor on it..." says Biyomon before taking another bite out of the fruit. Gatomon nods in agreement. "Well, we've never seen it before, so it makes sense it would have it's own special flavor..." replies Gatomon, as she finishes off her half of the fruit.

As the fruit is digested, their bellies start to swell up, not enough to inhibit their movement but enough to be noticed. Gatomon gently pats her belly with the palm of her paw. "Oooh...I wonder how my belly got so big from just half a fruit..." wonders Gatomon.

Biyomon just shrugs as she looks down to find her belly in the same condition. "Well, even so, I don't feel full at all..." she says, just before a strange compulsion comes over her and Gatomon.
13.title: Sharing is nice too.

choices: giant parade balloons with swollen arms, legs, tails, and heads!
giant and puffy orbs with arms and legs sinking into them!
132.content: "I've got an idea!" said Gatomon, "Let's force feed each other!" "Good idea!" said Biyomon. And so, she grabbed the fruit and stuffed it into Gatomon's mouth. Gatomon took another friut and stuffed it into Biyomon's mouth. As they stuff themselves with fruit, they contiuned to grow and puff up. When half of the fruits remain on the tree, Biyomon and Gatomon are now...
132.title: Gatomon and Biyomon force-feed each other.

1322.content:
Soon enough the two resembled giant puffy orbs with the arms and legs sunken into their huge bodies, and their heads were close to sinking in as well.

"Hehehe..W-We're so huuuuge!" Gatomon said, murring contently in her swollen body.

"Yeah...This feels like simple heaven~" Biyomon replied with content murrs

The two kept floating as they felt the remains of their features sink into their swollen bodies.
1322.title: giant and puffy orbs with arms and legs sinking...

choices: One of the human girls they know.
Someone other than these two sets of girls.
134.content:
"Hehe...for some reason, I feel like bringing someone to the tree...a certain someone, that is..." says Gatomon.

Biyomon nods. "Oh yes, I know what you mean, let's find that someone and bloat that someone up, shall we?" replies Biyomon, as the two of them go off to find the person to bring to the tree.
134.title: They feel compelled to bring a particular someo...

1341.content:
Luckily for fulfilling their task, Biyomon and Gatomon were compelled to go after Palmon, a humanoid, plant-like digimon who also happens to be another friend of theirs. Despite being slightly bloated, they convince Palmon to take a look at the tree, under the assumption that's she's going along with them to see if the tree poses any danger.

Palmon looks up at the tree as Gatomon and Biyomon lead her to it. "Well...there doesn't seem to be anything too strange about the tree other than the fruits..." Palmon says, as she unknowingly walking onto an indentation in the ground in front of the tree. Because of her plant-like nature, she doesn't even need to eat the fruit to have the tree make her her to do things. The tree makes her want to suddenly lay out roots, and she begins doing so without thinking twice.

"In fact...this seems like as good as any place for a plant like me to relax." Palmon says, obeying the natural-sounding desire to spread out her roots. As she does this, her roots bind with those of the tree, and she starts to swell up where she stands. Gatomon and Biyomon, still under the influence of the fruit, feel no need to do anything other than watch, which is fine by Palmon since she seems to actually be enjoying it.

She doesn't even notice that the tree is starting to fuse with her when her body starts to push against it, though it's more like the tree is being absorbed into her, all except for it's branches, which are sticking out of her swollen body like multiple sets of additional limbs. Her own arms have grown with her, giving her the appearance of a big, green ball with a couple of appendages that are as long as the tree trunk used to be and twice as wide. Palmon giggles. "Mmm...I feel like a whole new plant..." Palmon says, as she pats Gatomon and Biyomon on the head. "Hehe, thanks for the help." she says, unclear as to whether the tree is talking or Palmon herself is talking.
1341.title: Planting a Plant

choices: gatomon suggests getting more digimon first.
13413.content:
Palamon felt a bit of something in the back of her head as there seemed to be another within her conciousness. Her eyes shut slowly as biyomon and gatomon look at each other in a bit of confusion wondering what palamon was doing. When palamon opened her eyes again, she simply smiled and gave her massive figure a gentle patting on the belly. "Well seems like I got myself a new occupation with this."

"What would that be?" Gatomon asked a bit as Biyomon seems to try and hop up to get at one of the fruits.

Palmon smiles at Biyomon and lowered the fruit down to biyomon so she could eat. "Well I was feeling something going on with this tree, and it seems to like having digimon to blow up and play with...especially girl ones." She smiled.

Gatomon blushed a bit at the thought of how she said it while biyomon pigged out on another fruit, her belly filling up bigger than before as her body seems to swell up bigger than before, only the rest of her looking like she's blowing up like a balloon from that one fruit. As her figure filled, she felt herself getting gassy before letting out a rather rude- "BRRRAAAP!" "Whoop, scuse me." She giggled.

Palmon just giggled and patted a vine on her head. "Oh don't be. you should be happy that you're all full and happy right now."

"But what's this about filling up girl digimon?" Gatomon interjected

Palmon just brought Gatomon over with a stretched out finger vine and snug beside Biyomons big belly before passing her a fruit too. "Just eat up and enjoy ok kitty cat?" She giggled.

Gatomon just blushes a bit as she took a bite of the fruit, feeling a rather filling embrace take her belly as she does and seemed to be compelled to keep eating more of it as she did. When she was done, she was about as swollen up and round as biyomon was, both girl digi's looking rather wobbly at their swollen embrace. "*BURRRAAAP!* Oh my..pardon me."

Biyomon giggled back before letting out a rather rude belch back at her. "Oh don't be *BUURRRP!* silly gatomon!"

Palmon smiled at the two ballooned up digimon girls as her vines give a slow encircling of their torso's and lifting them up atop of her massive green belly. "My little digimon balloons wanna eat more fruit and get nice and ripe for me?"
13413.title: A combination of both.

134131.content:
Biyomon nodded eagerly, squealing in delight. Gatomon was a little hesitant, but smiled and nodded as well, the inflation starting to appeal to her.

"Mmm, good," purred the Palmon, placing the two fat digimon on the ground, then using her new vines to knock down fruit after fruit after fruit, both digigirls eagerly grabbing up the fruit and chowing down, stopping to let out a burp or two every few minutes, their bodies growing more and more swollen.
134131.title: The two girls agree eagerly

1341311.content:
With how swollen the two digimon were getting, their bodies started to lift up out of Palmons' hold. Gatomon panicked a bit in surprise, but Biyomon squealed out and flapped her barely able feathers playfully at how high she was getting. Palmon shot some vines to their ankles and yanked them on down to help them keep close to the warm plant digimon's big belly.

"Now now, I don't want my digiballoons flying away now do I?" She giggled, and her vines slowly twist up and squeeze their giant figures playfully. One good squeeze caused both gassy girls to belch out loudly. "And you're getting so gassy too! Though I wonder, are my girls getting hungry, or do they wanna get another balloon for the collection?"
1341311.title: They suddenly start to float

13413112.content: "Feeding time!" said Palmon as she grabbed more fruit and stuffed them into Gatomon and Biyomon's mouths. As she contiuned to stuff more and more into Biyomon and Gatomon, they continued to swell up and inflate like Thanksgiving Day Parade Balloons and still growing. Palmon stopped when there's no more fruit left and Biyomon and Gatomon are now over 1,000 feet wide balloons! Suddenly...
13413112.title: Feeding time

134131121.content: Palmon grows more fruit. Then, she eats the fruit which causes her to inflate bigger. The branches are being absored into her giant body. As she continues to swell up, her vines are now growing fruit of the tree of inflation. She has become the digitree of inflation. As she stopped at the same size as Biyomon and Gatomon she said in a booming voice, "I have become the tree and I shall be Queen!" Then...
134131121.title: Palmon grows more fruit.

1341311211.content: Veemon appears and says, "Palmon, what happened to you?" "I have become queen," said Palmon, "and you will be my king!" She stuffs friut into Veemon and watched him grow and inflate like a parade balloon. She contiuned to him stuff him and watch him grow bigger and bigger until he's the same size as she is. Then, she used her vines so that they went into Veemon's large body and pumped her liquid into him. Then, fruit grows all over his arms and legs. Then...
1341311211.title: A Veemon appears!

1341312.content:
Palmon smiled as her friends continued to inflate themselves on her fruit, her tendrils starting to wrap around their swollen forms, stroking them.

"Ohhh...what're you dooooing?" moaned Biyomon, the vines' rubbing on her fat body sending a shiver of pleasure down her spine. Next to her, Gatomon purred loudly and twitched her tail as Palmon rubbed her all over.

"Mmm, you two look so fat and sexy...how can I help myself?" purred the bloated plant, a tendril sliding down in between each of her friends' legs, rubbing at their crotch.
1341312.title: Palmon starts to...play.

134132.content: Gatomon said, "Nope, let's find some more digimon first." "You're right." said Palmon. Then, she saw...
134132.title: Getting more digimon!

choices: Biyomon tries to get the guys into inflation
Veemon suddenly starts rubbing one of the girl digimon's belly
1341321.content:
The three male digimon hadn't seemed to notice them yet, so Gatomon whistled and waved them over, the three males wasting no time in coming over to the three femme digimon.

"Hey Gato-wha! What the heck happened to you two?" yelped Agumon, finally seeing their bloated forms. Biyomon and Palmon giggled while Gatomon blushed a little. As for the males, Agumon's jaw was hanging open, Gomamon kept looking from Biyomon to Gatomon to Palmon...and Veemon had a shy grin on his face, a blush on his snow-white cheeks.

"Well, Biyomon here came across this tree with some weird fruit and...," began Gatomon, explaining what had happened, Agumon and Gomamon's looks of shock and surprise growing. Veemon, however, still had a grin on his face and his eyes kept going over Gatomon's and Biyomon's swollen bodies.
1341321.title: Veemon, Gomamon and Agumon

13413212.content:
With a loud murr, Veemon suddenly darted up to Biyomon and got on his knees, paws rubbing all over her swollen tummy. The bloated bird let out a loud awwk of surprise, looking down at the dragon digimon.

"Uhh Veemon...what the heck are you doing?" she asked, cooing in spite of her surprise, her swollen tummy quite sensitive. Veemon looked up at her, the shy grin still on his face and his blush deepening...making him look a little cute.

"I...I...I like...big bellies," he said, letting out a nervous giggle.
13413212.title: Veemon suddenly starts rubbing one of the girl ...

choices: she plants her roots with those of the tree
1341322.content:
a Floramon. It was the same Floramon from France and she said, "Why are you so big and puffy?" "Because we tired the fruit and puffed up like balloons." said Biyomon. "Oh," thought the French Floramon, "Can I try some?" "Sure, you can have some" said Palmon.

She grabbed one of the fruit and gave it to Floramon. "Thanks." she said as she took a bite out of the fruit. But then, she felt something growing in her body. It was the air inside her and she swelled up slowly. She took another bite and expanded bigger and faster. When she ate the whole thing, she was the size of Biyomon and Gatomon. Then, she stopped expanding and let out a big "BRAAAAAAAAAAAAP! Oh, pardon me." she said. Then,
1341322.title: Another plant!

info.brief_description: A strange tree in the Digital World leads to some expanding fun.
info.description:
Biyomon, a pink bird digimon, discovers a strange tree with strange fruit in the Digital World. What adventures lie in wait?

Anything goes save for scat, watersports, and gore. As far as inflation, this is mostly a gas inflation focused story, so please refrain from putting in weight gain and blueberry inflation. However, liquid inflation is okay.

As with my other story, popping is now allowed with the same requirement; they have to go happy.
